comments:
Build 20020521 with 20020515 fragments

When I Switch tpo the Install/Update perspective in German I get a message box 
that says "The markup in the document following the root element must be well 
formed".

STEPS
1) Start Eclipse in German with German fragments
2) Select Fenster->Perspektiv ?ffnen->Install update
3) You get the message

The problem appears to be in the Install new features part of the Preview text
Where can we get the fragments? They are not posted on eclipse.org
